Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $120 by both myself and you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it's a great investment for anyone looking to enhance their experience. I am currently offering this exceptional product to you for $110. This special offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in its value. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something truly remarkable. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $110. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $110
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
